entry.title: About Me
entry.content:
千万经纪 （10 Million Producer 2009, 2010, 2011 & 2012）: Connie Zhao。
查看客户的好评: http://www.zillow.com/profile/Connie-Zhao/Reviews/
这个blog, 是我积累的对市场的观察。 按时间顺序，从早到晚。左边有按TAG分类的目录，便于查找到感兴趣的内容。基本上是熬夜写的，难免语法不通。 别挑剔&见谅～ 只是希望给buyer们提供一些有用的信息，同时也给自己的Realtor生涯留个印记。
联络我，conniezhao@gmail.com or 858-877-3858。第一次联系我请尽量email.
顺便就表扬一下自己：
1. 不push客户。无压力看房。
2. 带客户看房，分析地区利弊, 挑出房子的问题和优点缺点。动心了可能还要再泼点冷水。房子肯定是没有十全十美的， 就算是几百万上千万的房子一样有这样那样的缺点。一个agent, 看到了这些缺点不说出来， 一心让客户写offer，不会就是去给开门的吧？
3. 我不是一个boring的agent。这点非常重要。 make a big difference。 因为看房的过程可短可长。 能不boring尽量enjoy。
好的agent需要融会很多方面的知识， 地区，学区，房子本身结构材料，贷款，保险。。。需要对市场敏感，还要对整个社区的人口组成，地理位置，最近成交清清楚楚。 最重要的是能站在客户的立场上为他们着想。这也正是很多agent都做不到的。
My clients only: 看房流水帐： http://ca858.blogspot.com/

entry.title: About Me
entry.content:
千万经纪 （10 Million Producer 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012 & 2013）: Connie Zhao。
查看客户的好评: http://www.zillow.com/profile/Connie-Zhao/Reviews/
这个博客, 是我积累的对市场的想法。 按时间顺序，左边有按TAG分类的目录，便于查找到感兴趣的内容。因为基本上是熬夜写的，难免语法不通, 文采欠缺。 别挑剔&见谅～ 希望能给buyer们提供一些有用的信息，同时也给自己的Realtor生涯留个印记。
联络我，conniezhao@gmail.com or 858-926-5268。第一次联系我请尽量email.
顺便就表扬一下自己：
1. 不push客户。无压力看房。
2. 看房，分析地区利弊, 挑出房子的问题和优点缺点。动心了可能还要再泼点冷水。房子肯定是没有十全十美的， 就算是几百万上千万的房子一样有这样那样的缺点。一个agent, 看到了这些缺点不说出来， 一心让客户写offer，不会就是去给开门的吧？
3. 我不是一个boring的Agent。也是个会说人话的Agent。 这点非常重要。 make a big difference。 因为看房的过程可短可长。 能不boring尽量enjoy。
好的agent需要融会很多方面的知识， 地区，学区，房子本身结构材料，贷款，保险。。。需要对市场敏感，还要对整个社区的人口组成，地理位置，最近成交清清楚楚。 最重要的是能站在客户的立场上为他们着想。这也正是很多agent都做不到的。
My clients only: 看房流水帐： http://ca858.blogspot.com/
我的钢琴博客： http://adzpiano.blogspot.com/

entry.title: 美国买车攻略！
entry.content: 先去Edmunds做功课， 然后联系internet部门， 或者打电话， 价格谈得合适了， 过去取车。

entry.title: Pacific Highland Ranch Newest Update Summer 2015
entry.content:
首先呢， 谁能想到56和Carmel Valley Rd之间竟然还可以开发如此大片的房子？
早在1999年， 整个Pacific Highland Ranch就已经规划好了。 时日如飞16年了， 可以看到当初的规划都已经变成了现实。 Amazing!
现在正在开发的小区， 除了Watermark, 还有3个较小户型的小区。
第一个是 Verena
第二和第三个放在一起说， 都是小户型， 院子比较小， 价格也非常affordable, (在CV）
最后一个是 Elms & Ivy 唯一一个不是Pardee开发的小区， 一共有174个Unit, 146个小户型和28个低收入的。
Elms & Ivy is a proposed 30 acre development centered on the Pacific Highlands Ranch Subarea. The project proposes 174 units, including 146 single family and 28 affordable units. Elms & Ivy faced the challenges of site redesigns for the accommodation of 3 different home types (traditional, motor-court, and alley loaded units) to address Community and Staff demands.

link.title: Pacific Highland Ranch Newest Update Summer 2015

entry.title: 再次总结美国家具店里面卖的牌子

div.style: background-color: white; color: #444444; font-family: 'Lucida Grande', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24.5px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;
background-color: white; color: #444444; line-height: 24.5px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;

span.style: font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: 家具从结构上分两类:casegoods and uphostery. casegood就是指木头结构并且大量木头外露的，象桌子，椅子，床,dresser等。uphostery则是需要在木头上面加布料包裹成形的，象沙发那些。我们现在要买的主要的casegoods,所以砖头主要是这方面的。

div.style: background-color: white; color: #444444; line-height: 24.5px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;

span.style: font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: 最开始唯一知道的是ENGLISH Dovetail.是一种木头连接的方法，看Drawer一定要看这个，最好是有，而且要作的比较精细。如果是靠螺丝拧在一起，不是件好事情噢。

div.style: background-color: white; color: #444444; line-height: 24.5px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;

span.style: font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: 还有就是Drawer的悬挂，好一点的会除了两边的side-hung还有中间的wood-on-wood central glide. 这样保证Drawer的运动非常流畅，重量分布均匀，好用且耐用。STICKLEY在这面很有特色，它家所有的都是这样作的，只要一个小手指头，拉住任何一边的PULL,都可以轻巧地拉出，不会偏移卡住。

div.style: background-color: white; color: #444444; line-height: 24.5px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;

span.style: font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: 木头都有自己的花纹。木纹的拼接另家具别具一格。现在的家具很多都用Veneer,就是很薄的一层木头，贴在木头的表面，来达到美观的效果。一个原因是象桌子表面，没有整块那么大的木头，是多块拼接在一起形成长板的。另一个是有的木头非常紧缺和昂贵，可以做出非常奇异的花纹，有的作Veneer都不错了，不可能用来作主体。所以Veneer不是低品质的象征，要看是什么样的Veneer，做的好不好。我们看的高端的家具，用Veneer加实木的非常的多。

div.style: background-color: white; line-height: 24.5px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;

span.style: font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: 上次还看到一个很好的网站，不仅有家具的glossary还有很多图片。我找到后贴上来，大家可以学习参考一下。这样到了家具店，也可以和人谈的起来，得到更多的信息。

div.span: Very good product. Harden offers bedroom, dining and occasional furniture. A small company with good attention to quality. Priced at about Drexel.

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: Upper-end company manufacturing mostly occasional furniture. They have an excellent desk program. Good quality. Priced near Drexel and

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;
font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;
span.span: One of the top 10 producers of fine wood and upholstered furniture. Beautiful finishes, beautiful woodwork, beautiful design. If you own Hendredon, you own some of the very best.

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: Very high quality, solid wood furniture. Many traditional designs. Priced near the top.

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: Expensive and lush. Magnificent wood furniture. Perhaps the most opulent of the American manufacturers. Collectable. Very distinctive design and execution.

span.style: font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;
span.span: Oneof the great values in wood furniture in the United States. I believe Lexington gives you more bang for your buck than any other line in the country. Is it the best? No, but it may be the best value. Lexingtonis a consistent industry leader in style offerings.

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: One of the world's biggest producers of leather upholstery. Perhaps some of the best-styled leather product to be found anywhere. I don't think it is the best quality but, for the money, you may not be able to do better.

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: PennsylvaniaHouse Furniture Company

span.style: font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;
span.span: A consistent producer of good traditional wood furniture and upholstery. Long in the shadow of Ethan Allen, it deserves its own place in the sun. It would be a mistake to miss shopping this fine company.
Competes with Stanleybut usually a little more dramatic in its presentation.

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: Stanley Furniture Company

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: Modestly-priced, often very excitingly-styled furniture. Excellent value, a good line for your first home. Usually priced below Lexington.

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: Stickley Furniture Company

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: The price mover behind the arts and crafts movement and still the force behind the mission style that is very big now. Stickley is what fine furniture-making is all about. Uncompromising quality and unquestioned status as one of the country's finest wood furniture producers. Expensive, but you will be glad to own a piece of Stickley.

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

div.span: Sumter Cabinet

span.style: font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;
span.span: Well-priced, solid wood line. Well put-together, although most designs are pretty basic. Very good value.

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: SimSun; font-size: 6.5pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial;
color: #111111; font-family: SimSun; font-size: 6.5pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial;

span.span: 是一种木头连接的方法，看

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: SimSun; font-size: 6.5pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial;

span.span: 一定要看这个，最好是有，而且要作的比较精细。如果是靠螺丝拧在一起，不是件好事情噢。

span.style: font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;

span.span: 的悬挂，好一点的会除了两边的

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: SimSun; font-size: 6.5pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial;
color: #111111; font-family: SimSun; font-size: 6.5pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial;

span.span: 的运动非常流畅，重量分布均匀，好用且耐用。

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: SimSun; font-size: 6.5pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial;

span.span: 在这面很有特色，它家所有的都是这样作的，只要一个小手指头，拉住任何一边的

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: SimSun; font-size: 6.5pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial;

span.span: 都可以轻巧地拉出，不会偏移卡住。

span.style: font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif;
color: #111111; font-family: SimSun; font-size: 6.5pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial;

span.span: 木头都有自己的花纹。木纹的拼接另家具别具一格。现在的家具很多都用

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: SimSun; font-size: 6.5pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial;

span.span: 就是很薄的一层木头，贴在木头的表面，来达到美观的效果。一个原因是象桌子表面，没有整块那么大的木头，是多块拼接在一起形成长板的。另一个是有的木头非常紧缺和昂贵，可以做出非常奇异的花纹，有的作

span.style: color: #111111; font-family: SimSun; font-size: 6.5pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial;

span.span: 都不错了，不可能用来作主体。所以

div.span: Distinctive and outstanding producer of fine contemporary wood and upholstered furniture. Some of the most pleasing contemporary designs produced in the U.S. come out of this company. Beautiful finishes that few other producers even attempt. If you are after a look for today and can indulge yourself, you must take a look at Marge Carson. This producer has had a heavy impact on upper-end furnture styles in the U.S. Priced at the Henredon/Heritage level.

entry.title: ICL 12年纪生交流经验会
entry.content:
为了给广大的家长和高中生提供一个和今年升学的12年纪学生面对面交流的机会， ICL邀请到了三名来自不同高中的12年级生为大家做一个讲座。 这三名高中生都已经拿到了MIT的录取通知。 他们将非常乐意和大家分享他们在高中的学习经历以及申请过程。
Tony Cao, 现于Westview高中读12年纪。 已经被MIT录取。 在高中期间修读了14门AP课。 去年从在USA Biology Olympiad进入National Finalist（前20名）今年在AIME第七名。 在校期间， 曾经成立了校Science Club， 组织学生参加UToronto National Biology Competition 以及 the North American Computational Linguistics Olympiad。Tony 也是 Key Club的成员， 并且是Tutoring club 的成员。 Tony 还担任了CSF的VP和President. Tony 业余时间喜欢打网球。 暑假的时候也担任学生指导， 在UCSD和 Gateway夏令营。
Jessica 现就读 Rancho Bernardo High.
Jessica吹奏笛子， 是圣地亚哥青年交响乐团的成员。 她是Key Club的主席并负责财务。 Jessica参加过科学奥林匹克， 拿过第一名。 她曾经参加并且进入美国国家化学奥林匹克决赛。 她也是AIME的Honor获得者。 Jessica暑期为Gateway的学生做指导老师。 也在ICL学校指导低年级学生数学。
Andrew Shea, 现就读 Del Norte High.
Andrew 以4.38 的GPA即将毕业位于 4S Ranch的 Del Norte Highschool. 他不但是学习优异， 而且在各种运动和俱乐部都担任重要职位。 他是Breakdance俱乐部的发起人并且担任主席一职。 他也是男子短跑的Champoionship winner. Andrew 吹奏萨克斯管， 长跑， 参加UCSD的creative math team。 他积极参与社区活动， 曾经给加州参议院Joel Anderson做过实习生， 也在图书馆做过上百小时的义工， 教孩子们数学和跳舞。
时间： 六月七日上午10点到12点
地点： ICL International Culture Learning
10720 Thornmint Road, SuiteC,
San Diego, CA 92127

div.style: color: #3d3d3d; font-family: 'Lucida Sans unicode', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: 17px; list-style: none; padding: 0px 9px 25px 4px;

content.div:
1. Unsatisfactory references from landlords, employers and/or personal references.
2. Evictions.
3. Frequent moves. You have to decide what constitutes frequent moves and apply the same criteria to every applicant.
4. Bad credit report. If a report shows they are not current with any bill, have been turned over to a collection agency, have been sued for a debt, or have a judgment for a debt, that is grounds to reject. These do not have to be debts connected in any way with housing.
5. Too short a time on the job. As with frequent moves, you have to decide what too short a time is and apply the same criteria to every applicant.
6. Too new to the area. There is nothing to say you have to rent to people who have just moved to town. Be careful, though, many times these would be excellent tenants and the time and long distance call expense of checking them out could pay big dividends.
7. Smokers. Some newspapers mistakenly believe that smokers are a protected “handicapped” class. They will never be. The tobacco companies would not allow it. Do do so would be to admit that tobacco and nicotine are addicting. Industry lobbyists would be sure to fight that idea tooth and nail. So you can safely discriminate against people who smoke. Newspapers will not accept ads that say “no smokers,” but they will accept ads that say “no smoking.”
8. No verifiable source of income.
9. Too many vehicles. Lots of cars can be a real source of irritation to neighbors and make the entire neighborhood or apartment complex look bad. Chances are, if they have more than one vehicle for every adult they spend a lot of time broken and being fixed. That means they could be in pieces in the front yard or parking lot.
10. Too many people for the property. Be extremely careful with this. Before the familial status protection clause of the Fair Housing Act, you could discriminate on this basis without fear of any problems. Not any more. Now the same criteria must be applied without regard to the age of the inhabitant. Be sure it is applied equally to all applicants. Check your state’s Landlord-Tenant Law.
11. Drug users. They must be current drug users. If they are in a drug treatment program and no longer use drugs, the Federal Government considers them handicapped and protected by the Fair Housing Act.
12. Pets.
13. Any evidence of illegal activity. You must be able to come up with some kind of satisfactory evidence. I don’t know what that would be, every case would be different. Certainly a letter from the police department warning a previous landlord of their illegal activity and threatening to close the property is considered sufficient evidence.
14. History of late rental payments.
15. Insufficient income. You must set up objective criteria applied equally to each applicant. Insufficient income could reasonably be if the scheduled rent exceeded 35% of their gross monthly income.For example, if the rent is $600, their gross monthly income must be at least $1714.29. The formula is: Acceptable income= scheduled rent divided by income ratio. You can require proof of all income. Be careful, though, if you are willing to accept only one member of a married couple to supply the total dollar income, you must be willing to accept the same of unmarried, co-tenants that share the housing. Under Fair Housing law you cannot require that unmarried people meet different income requirements than married people.
16. Too many debts. Even if their gross income is sufficient, they may have so many other debts that they would be hard pressed to make all the payments. A rule of thumb might be that all contracted debts, including rent, cannot exceed 50% of their gross income. Contracted debts would be such things as credit card payments, car payments, loans, etc. Those would not be cable TV, water and garbage, telephone, or other utilities.
17. Conviction of a crime which was a threat to property in the past five years. Included in this could be drunk driving convictions, burglary convictions, robbery convictions, and other such misbehaviors.
18. Conviction for the manufacture or distribution of a controlled substance in the past five years. The best way to proceed is to post a list of the acceptable rental criteria and hand it to each applicant.

div.style: color: #3d3d3d; font-family: 'Lucida Sans unicode', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: 17px; list-style: none; padding: 0px 9px 25px 4px;

content.div: You can use the list above, but under no circumstances is it intended to be legal advice. Check with an attorney who is familiar with the Landlord-Tenant Law before posting or handing out anything like a list of acceptable criteria for applicants. Laws change constantly, and what you don’t know can and will hurt you.

link.title: San Diego County Highest API Scores (2013)

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
div.span: 年年底，回顾一下这一年的重点 -

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
div.span: 1.房地产价格提升高过了各种预测和官方预期。也超过了大多数买家的预期。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
div.span: 从二月份开始房价开始了一天一个价的势头。 不但买家的脚步跟不上， 业内人士也都大跌眼镜。 到年底势头仍然没有减弱。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
div.span: 2.贷款利率有所提高但是仍然保持在历史低点

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
div.span: 房利美
30年期贷款利率在2012年底为3.45%，在2013年底，这个数字达到了4.49%，预测2014年年初到三月份，贷款利率将维持不变。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
div.span: 3.低房源。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
div.span: 综合低房价，低利率，低市场保有量的因素影响，一个房源多家竞争的例子屡见不鲜 。好区出来还不错的房子基本上都是5个offer以上。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
div.span: 4.买方接受并认为现在是“价格合理和稳定”的房地产市场。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
div.span: 尽管2013年的房价较2012年已经有了两位百分数的增长，但是由于贷款利率维持在较低水平和工作稳定性的提高，买家依然认为房产价格处于过去30年房价历史数据中的合理区间。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

content.div: 5.”现金买家”仍然是买家中的有力力量。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

content.div: 在2013年度有33.6%的买家是全款现金支付，在过去的3年中，这一比重一直是呈现上升趋势，而在这些现今买家中，“海外热钱”（非美国本土居民）的现金买家数量也呈上升趋势。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
div.span: 6.房租价格的上涨和租方需求量的上升使得投资房成为买房的另一中坚力量。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
div.span: 在
2002年约70%的美国人拥有房产，其中30%的房产拥有者选择将其出租投资，而在2013年，约65%的美国人拥有房产，其中35%的房产拥有者选择将其出租投资。因此，投资性买房在过去一段时间内上涨也颇为显著。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

entry.title: 美国比较好的家具牌子汇总和介绍

div.style: background-color: white; color: #444444; font-family: 'Lucida Grande', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24.5px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;
background-color: white; color: #444444; font-family: 'Lucida Grande', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24.5px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;

content.div:
Baker Furniture CompanyOne of the best. At the very least, one of the top five producers of fine wood and upholstered furniture in the United States. Very expensive, but worth every dollar. Collectable, and surely one of tomorrow's heirlooms.
Bassett Furniture CompanyModest but honest value. Good starter furniture or perfect for kids' rooms and vacation homes. One of the largest domestic producers of case goods and upholstery.
Bernhardt Furniture CompanyA wonderful line of impressive fine wood product. Their approach to finishes has always baffled me a bit as it seems they work hard to produce muted, opaque finishes while I prefer clearer, transparent finishes--a minor point when the line is considered in toto. Absolutely one of the better lines in the United States.
Broyhill Furniture CompanyGood values, a well-priced, nicely styled line. Don't hesitate to give it a good look. Carried by many large chains.
Century Furniture CompanyCertainly one of the top 10 producers of fine wood furniture and upholstery in the U.S. Beautifully styled and beautifully finished, a line to look for when considering the best.
Drexel-Heritage Furniture CompanyIts best collections are as good as it gets. A big lineup of product from modest to expensive. I always consider Drexel the point where price and value meet. Pay more and you get more glitter, but not more value. Pay less and you really are getting less. The Heritage product is as good as it gets. Heritage competes directly with Century and Henredon.
E.J. VictorRelatively new, but immediately a leading contender for inclusion in our top 10 producers of the very finest wood product and upholstery product. Simply magnificent furniture. You will only find it displayed in your area's finest stores. Expensive, but well worth it.
Ethan Allen Furniture CompanyOne of the great success stories in the furniture world. Its product assortment and store presentations have set the standard for all other producers to follow. You will never be unhappy with an Ethan Allen purchase. Generally priced at the lower end of the Drexel and Thomasville lines.
Ferguson CopelandA newer company that is offering a tremendous amount of style and pizzazz for the money. Check them out.
Flexsteel Furniture CompanyOne of the country's largest producers of upholstery product. Good, solid, reliable upholstery, well-priced and well-styled.
Guy Chaddock & CompanyMy personal favorite for the finest country wood pieces produced in the United States. Their finishes are works of art. A piece of Guy Chaddock can make a room. I would buy a piece from any of their collections, sight unseen, and know I would love it.
Hancock & MooreExcellent leather furniture. Generally considered to be the top of the line for leather upholstery.
Harden Furniture CompanyVery good product. Harden offers bedroom, dining and occasional furniture. A small company with good attention to quality. Priced at about Drexel.
Hekman Furniture Co.Upper-end company manufacturing mostly occasional furniture. They have an excellent desk program. Good quality. Priced near Drexel and Thomasville.
Henredon Furniture CompanyOne of the top 10 producers of fine wood and upholstered furniture. Beautiful finishes, beautiful woodwork, beautiful design. If you own Hendredon, you own some of the very best.
Highland House Furniture Co.One of the country's top producers of fine upholstery. Beautiful designs, careful, excellent quality standards. You will never make a mistake buying this product.
Henkel HarrisVery high quality, solid wood furniture. Many traditional designs. Priced near the top.
Hooker Furniture CompanyMedium-priced entertainment centers, bedroom and occasional furniture. Excellent value. One of the leading producers of entertainment centers. A good buy. Give them a good look.
Karges Furniture Co.Expensive and lush. Magnificent wood furniture. Perhaps the most opulent of the American manufacturers. Collectable. Very distinctive design and execution.

div.style: background-color: white; color: #444444; font-family: 'Lucida Grande', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24.5px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;
background-color: white; color: #444444; font-family: 'Lucida Grande', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24.5px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;
margin: 0px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;

div.div:
Kindel Furniture CompanyKindel's big problem is the ever-diminishing number of purists who appreciate the understated elegance and refinement of this grand line. Expensive, but a true collectible.
Lane Furniture CompanyMiddle of the road. Competes with Lexington and below.
Lexington Furniture CompanyOne of the great values in wood furniture in the United States. I believe Lexington gives you more bang for your buck than any other line in the country. Is it the best? No, but it may be the best value. Lexington is a consistent industry leader in style offerings.
Maitland-Smith Furniture CompanyOne of the largest and earliest developers of exciting wood product coming out of the Philippines. Many unusual pieces, a very exciting line. Heavy in occasional wood furniture. Uses techniques that cannot be touched by mainland producers. Even with all the excitement and style, a very affordable collection of items. Very influential in the industry.
Marge Carson Furniture Co.Distinctive and outstanding producer of fine contemporary wood and upholstered furniture. Some of the most pleasing contemporary designs produced in the U.S. come out of this company. Beautiful finishes that few other producers even attempt. If you are after a look for today and can indulge yourself, you must take a look at Marge Carson. This producer has had a heavy impact on upper-end furnture styles in the U.S. Priced at the Henredon/Heritage level.
Natuzzi Furniture CompanyOne of the world's biggest producers of leather upholstery. Perhaps some of the best-styled leather product to be found anywhere. I don't think it is the best quality but, for the money, you may not be able to do better.
Pennsylvania House Furniture CompanyA consistent producer of good traditional wood furniture and upholstery. Long in the shadow of Ethan Allen, it deserves its own place in the sun. It would be a mistake to miss shopping this fine company.
PulaskiCompetes with Stanley but usually a little more dramatic in its presentation.
Stanley Furniture CompanyModestly-priced, often very excitingly-styled furniture. Excellent value, a good line for your first home. Usually priced below Lexington.
Stickley Furniture CompanyThe price mover behind the arts and crafts movement and still the force behind the mission style that is very big now. Stickley is what fine furniture-making is all about. Uncompromising quality and unquestioned status as one of the country's finest wood furniture producers. Expensive, but you will be glad to own a piece of Stickley.
Sumter CabinetWell-priced, solid wood line. Well put-together, although most designs are pretty basic. Very good value.
Thomasville Home FurnishingsA big, well-done line of excellent wood and upholstery. You should always make it a point to shop a Thomasville showcase store. They miss very few bases. A direct competitor with Drexel, Ethan Allen and the upper end of Lexington.
Universal Furniture CompanyA big offshore producer of modestly-priced wood furniture. Style and detailing is amazing when you consider their prices. A great value. At or below Stanley.
Vaughan-BassettModest case goods aimed at the mass marketer. Competes with Bassett and Universal.

div.span: 信用好， 人品好， 事要少！

span.style: font-family: "MS Mincho"; mso-ascii-font-family: Cambria; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: "MS Mincho"; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Cambria; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin;

div.span: 当今的美国，每年
对

span.style: font-family: "MS Mincho"; mso-ascii-font-family: Cambria; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: "MS Mincho"; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Cambria; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin;

div.span: 租房的需求爆棚般的速度增
长。这就意味着Tenant租客越来越不容易找到一个他们负担得起的理想住所，同时，也意味着房东越来越需要从申请人中选择满意的租房人选。
我这里倒是有一些大家可以考虑的选择理想租客的小建议：

u.span: 查看租客的信用和租房史：

div.span: 让潜在的房客填写申请表， 然后通过他们的社会安全号和现在居住地址就可以调出房客的信用记录。 此外，还可以联系租客之前的房东，看看租客是否按时付房租，是否精心照料房间，当然，租期长短也是很必要的。如果可能的话可以询问一下租客的工作情况，比如，是否稳定或薪资情况。

u.span: 和未来的租客“面试”一下，

div.span: 给你一个未来租客的大概印象。同时也会让你有一个基本的感觉——将来和租客相处会不会很舒服。房东和房客之间的互信和相知是很重要的，“面试”一下，
即便租客的租房史非常不错，但是如果你怎么看这个租客都不爽，那就千万不要委屈自己了！毕竟现在租房是卖房市场，相信房东不会空置房子太久的。
不同的房子可以收不同比例的押金，一般是
4-6周的房租。已经快成常识了，租客不会因为这个而放弃的。
如果附近房源的综合性价比都比自己的好一些，那就试着也提高自己房子的性价比。Craiglist是最佳的对比查找来源。

u.span: 对自己的房子了如指掌：

div.span: 提前准备好给租客各种可能问题的答案。这也是展示你是个合格租房的好机会。举止友好且合理是很必要的。
作为一个合理租方的关键是找到理想的租客，免得把你的生活和工作搞得一团糟，毕竟我们是要把房子租出去而不是当兼职“消防员”
所有房东显然不希望长时间一天到晚解决和房客们的纠纷。如果想找一个理想的租客肯定是要花点时间的，所以在前一位租客准备离开时就提前一段时间开始物色下一位房客吧。

entry.title: 不要纠结 - 理智分析一个房子是否值得投资

div.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
div.span: 这篇文章出自万枫在2009年发表于文学城的投资理财版。 我个人觉得分析透彻，条理清楚。 暨大家都在争相购入投资房之际， 转发于此给大家参考。 Credit goes to Feng Wan @ Wenxuecity

div.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
div.span: 究竟应当怎样判断一项房地产是否值得的投资？ 凭的主要是三项指标： 1 ） Cap Rate ， 2 ） Cash flow ，和 3 ） Return on equity 。 它们各反映不同的层面，各有各的用处。慢慢说明。

div.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
div.span: 1 ） Cap Rate ：年租金净收入除以购买价格。年租金净收入=年租金收入-房地产税，保险费等等费用，但不包括贷款利息和贷款保险。 Cap Rate 是购买投资性房产的重要指标。它直接反映投资回报和房产价格之间的关系。

div.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
div.span: 但是，市场上待售的房产的 Cap Rate 是相对稳定的，卖方也不是傻子，租金收入高的房产价格就会高，租金收入低的房产价格就会低。所以一个局部市场的 Cap Rate 是相对稳定的，一般能达到 6-8% 就不错了。经济危机的情况下，购买到高 Cap Rate 房产的机会增多，但在一般情况下，找到很高 Cap Rate 的房产可能是一种奢望，只有在价格扭曲的市场里才有可能。 Cap Rate 是个前提，但不能直接反映你是否盈利，因为，它不能反映你的资金成本。

div.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
div.span: 2 ） Cash flow ：即每年在运作该房产，实际进出的现金流量。如果得到现金，则为正现金流；如果要贴进现金则为负现金流。

div.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
div.span: 按照广泛接受的定义，现金流量，仅反映现金形式的资本进出该房产的状况，是个流动性（ liquidity ）指标，它既不代表收入（ income ），也不代表盈利 (Return) 。比如，一个完全没有租金收入的房产，可以通过倒按揭（ reverse mortgage ）的方式获得正的现金流。又比如，在固定 Cap Rate 的条件下，现金流可以由于贷款项目的不同（不同的头款和代款周期），而有不同的现金流。我注意到有些投资者把现金流的定义泛化了从而失去了现金流本身的意义。

div.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
div.span: 正现金流是房地产投资的重要健康指标，一个房地产大亨虽有亿万不动产，也会由于暂时现金流枯竭而轰然倒地。但是，单单片面地强调现金流，容易造成误解。因为，它本来就不是一个盈利指标，不能回答值得不值得的问题。要求就是能够维持呼吸就好。还有，如果同时投资多个房产，现金流问题要综合考虑，不必拘泥非得每一笔房产都要正现金流。

div.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
div.span: 3 ） Return on equity ：即每年运作该房产的净收入除以你实际投在该房产里的资本。其中，净收入（ Return ） = 年租金收入减去房地产税，保险费，维修费，管理费 , 贷款利息和按揭保险。注意，这里需要减除贷款利息和按接保险，而按揭里付进本金的部分不用减。分母的 equity = 房屋的价格减去贷款余额。你的房产是你和你的贷款银行共同拥有，有很大一部分 equity 是属于银行的。

div.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
div.span: Return on equity 直接反映了你投在该房产里的资本回报率，是最根本的盈利指标。如果这个回报率低于其他投资项目，对于我，比如达不到 10% ，就该考虑是否应该做。请注意，如果，是现金购买， Return on equity= Cap Rate ，所以，资本回报率一般不高。如果贷款，会有使用杠杆的放大作用，用好了可以大大提高 Return on equity 。

div.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
div.span: 下面以一个假想例子来表明这三种指标的运用。一房产价格 20 万（包括购买费用），年租金毛收入 1 万 8 千（ 1500/ 月），扣除房地产税，保险费，管理费等等费用后，年租净收入为 1 万 5 千。那么， Cap Rate 为 1 万 5 千 /20 万 =7.5% 。如果现金购买： Cash flow 为 1 万 5 千， Return on equity 为 7.5% 。如果，付 20% 头款，贷款 80% ， 30 年，利率 5% （按揭 10307/ 年，利息第一年 7946 ），那么， Cap Rate 不变仍为 7.5% ， Cash flow=15000-10307=4693/ 年， Return on equity= （ 15000-7946 ） /40000=17% 。根据这个分析，在给定的条件下，我会选择以贷款方式购买，虽然，现金流低于全现金购买（ 4693/ 年对 1 万 5 千），但资本回报率大大高于全现金购买（ 17% 对 7.5% ）。简单的说，你花了 4 万元获得了 4693/ 年 资本回报，好于你花 20 万仅获得 1 万 5 千的回报。这也是为什么计算 Return on equity 对判断盈利（是否合算和值得）最为重要的原因。

div.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;
div.span: 还有，应当注意的是，随着时间流逝，由于持续付按揭到本金部分，你在该房产里的 equity （分母）会越来越大，如果租金收入不变， Return on equity 会逐渐下降。应考虑增加租金，或者采取 Cash Back Refinance 方式，维持原来的杠杆，从而维持较高的 Return on equity 。

link.title: 不要纠结 - 理智分析一个房子是否值得投资

entry.title: UTC Mall updated with many new stores!!
entry.content:
UTC Mall renovation 基本上接近成功了。 走现代路线， 年轻有活力， 对比 Fashion Valley的奢华。
他们家新开了不少的饭馆。有人wonder 他家摆放在外面的 Patio Furniture吗？
http://www.schoenhuberfranchi.com/dati/LeisureLivingFurnishings_2011.pdf
加上附近的商圈，还是值得在假日和家人朋友们一起去relax & spend some money的。
另外今天的大新闻， 微软把诺基亚买了。

link.title: UTC Mall updated with many new stores!!

entry.title: 千叮咛万嘱咐 - 做贷款中要注意的问题

content.div:
这两年lender的要求越发严格苛刻，在你看房子期间就应该为了未来几个月做贷款有所准备：
1. 最近去mall里买东西， 店员热情地让你开张信用卡， 能省10%， 15%， 先忍忍， 别开了。 等买了房子再说。查一次信用分数最少要降10分。 另外， 你可以去myfico.com 去检测你的信用分。 信用分是贷款的基本。 关系到你能拿到的利息。 一定要维护好。
2. 从亲朋好友那里借钱或者gift, 有些lender还会要对方的2个月的银行流水。 所以不是那么简单。 先和自己的agent还有loan officer 沟通好。 凡事提前准备好。 另外loan officer也会帮你规划一下， 算好你需要准备多少首付加上Reserve.

3. 这个就是我不怕罗嗦不怕麻烦千叮咛万嘱咐的事情： 所有的进账, 银行会让你解释怎么来的，哪怕有的时候只有几百块钱！ 有一次客户就是一摸裤兜有200块钱顺便存银行了。 解释信写了好几次才过关。 你肯定说银行没事找事小题大做。 但是银行的确有很多页的guidelines, 遇到较真儿的underwriter你怎么办啊。
4. 换工作的， 工作有些状况的， 前后2个工作之间有Gap的， 也要提前和loan officer沟通。 基本上都是可以解决的， 就是要提前想到沟通好。

link.title: 千叮咛万嘱咐 - 做贷款中要注意的问题

td.style: font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 14.8px; line-height: 21px; margin: 0px;

tr.td:
目前，住宅抵押贷款利率正处于近五十年来最低的水平。更不必说，联储还信誓旦旦，保证要持续压低利率。
住宅价格更是大幅度下跌。在全美范围之内，住宅价格已经从其2007年的峰值下跌了25%以上，而诸如南佛罗里达等之前建筑速度过快的市场上，房价的跌幅甚至可以达到50%。
所有这一切联合起来发生作用，使得今日的美国人获得了一种非常理想的环境，拥有住宅的压力正处于1980年代以来最低的水平。住宅价格中值现在只相当于家庭收入中值的2.78倍，而在2005年，前者还相当于后者的4倍。
事实上，假如你现在入场买房，就会发现，自己还很可能获得更低的价格，因为卖家早已是忧心忡忡了。
待售住宅数量与每月实际销售住宅数量的比率已经处于接近历史纪录的高点。与此同时，抵押赎回权的丧失和新屋的开建还在使得库存不断膨胀。
经纪商的佣金规模持续缩水。过去那种6个百分点的收费标準早已不再适用，4%甚至更低才是今日的行情。我们还应该看到，为了推动住宅的销售，政府还将给予那些住宅购买者以相当的税务优惠。
可是，说破大天也无用，住宅销售还是一片疲软的景象。无论是新屋还是二手房，其销售成绩都较去年同期大幅度下滑，而与2005年所创下的历史纪录，更是比都不敢比。
这可不是信贷缺乏的缘故。与很多人所想象的相反，银行确实是在放款，只是比起几年前泡沫期间审慎许多，而这原本也属于正常。
即便银行已经严格了不少，但是那些可以拿出20%首付，并交出自己过去一两年收入情况证明文件——过去的要求也历来是如此——的人们会发现，大多数银行都非常乐于，甚至可以说非常急迫地想要和他们签约。
银行的急迫只能说明一件事，这就是住宅购买者的匮乏。尽管春天已经到来了，但是潜在的住宅购买者们却依然不肯走出自己的掩体，看看是否有合适的机会。
之所以会出现这样的局面，当然是若干原因联合作用的结果。比如说，大多数要购买新住宅的人同时还要卖掉自己的老住宅，但是毋庸赘言，卖房可要比买房艰难太多。
或者，更加重要的其实是，人们看待房价的态度已经发生了变化。
当初，泡沫不断膨胀，房价持续上涨，于是住宅购买者自然就慌乱起来，他们顾不上挑挑拣拣，一心只想着先下手为强，以免房价进一步上涨之后追悔莫及。然而现在，我们所处的却是住宅价格下跌的周期，买家都觉得如果他们现在不出手，房价明天必定还会更加便宜。
事实上，除非看到房价已经趋于稳定的迹象，潜在的买家是不会轻易入场的。归根结底，谁会愿意买进一种正在贬值的资产呢？尽管事实上，我们购买的许多东西都可以贴上这样的标签，比如汽车和家具之类。
此外，住宅的潜在购买者们还在等待一个重要的进展，即等待就业市场局面的改善——这很可能才是住宅销售面前最重要的障碍。
当前的失业率是如此之高，失业面是如此之广，人人都朝不保夕。且不说那些业已失业的人，即便还有一份工作，谁又敢在这样人人自危的当口来进行这样规模的消费呢？
或许，奥巴马总统达到了自己的医疗改革目标之后，可以拿出更多的时间和精力来面对现在正困扰着多数美国人的最重大的问题了，这便是就业问题。

entry.title: Village-style concept proposed for new 4S/Del Sur school

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: Village-style campus connected by a pedestrian mall is the favored concept for Poway Unified’s first school to unite kindergartners through eighth-graders on one campus.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: Various building, field and parking configurations — along with their selling points and pitfalls — for the 22-acre site in Del Sur were shown on Sept. 29 to participants at the conclusion of a three-day design symposium the district held to start creating its 39th campus.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: For now, planners will explore configurations for five two-story villages surrounding an administration building, multipurpose facility and perhaps an open-air gym. The villages could accommodate 150 students per floor that would each have five classrooms sharing a collaboration area and lab space. Lower levels could have adjacent outdoor areas or yards and upper levels have decks and balconies. In all, the campus could accommodate 1,500 students, with space to build additional villages if needed.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: The school is tentatively set to open in August 2014 to serve Black Mountain Ranch’s Del Sur community and perhaps the west side of 4S Ranch. It will relieve an ever-growing student population at Del Sur, Monterey Ridge and Stone Ranch elementary schools and Oak Valley Middle School.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: Del Sur development plans call for new housing and a town center west of the new campus that is bordered by Camino del Norte to the north, Lone Quail Drive to the east and Del Norte High to the south.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: There is interest for a health and fitness focus, but not one created around sports, and talk of a community garden with crops incorporated into meals served on campus.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: Other features receiving support are synthetic turf fields, separate student drop-off locations for buses and parents, and architectural features that create a campus identity when viewed from community roadways.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: “We really believe we can solve a lot of issues with good, solid planning,” Baker said.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: Tarantino called the initial plans “dramatic” and “awesome.”

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: A budget has yet to be determined, but Tarantino said the school will be financed through the community facility district.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: “We have the means to fund this without affecting the general fund or waiting for state (money),” he said.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: georgia, 'palatino linotype', palatino, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20.15625px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; vertical-align: baseline;
clear: both; text-align: center;

entry.title: Watermark June 7-8 Release 给决心填表的你们
entry.content:
对watermark下次release的价格， 我上一次release之后就估了1.2 （Plan 3）还是蛮准的。
Sales office第一次发出了一个价格清单， 是1.18， 第二天就发出了道歉信。 说发错了。 估计是内部定价讨论了一下， take the bet of the hot market, 又涨价了。 尴尬啊尴尬。而且这次Release还是来填表， 内部决定。 不公开。 只是你不买也一定来来办公室defer。 Builder牛了， 地少人多， 分不过来。 他咋说，你就得招办。
物以稀为贵。 新房， 好学区， 户型不错。 附近接地气儿。 买的人还是会乌泱乌泱的。 利息涨了不要紧， 4.25% 还是低。 现在就只能往前看了。

link.title: Watermark June 7-8 Release 给决心填表的你们

entry.title: 最近的房市
entry.content:
最近的房市不用我说大家也知道有多crazy, 已经可以说是insane了。
每一个房子都有一个story, how bidding war started and heated up... 我这几天和我的几个loan officer聊天，还有一个估价师聊天，他们都觉得这个市场不是很正常。 但是who cares, lowest inventory + 急需房子的buyers。
所谓市场， just a pool of buyers and a pool of sellers, 达到某种平衡。 现在是严重失调。
我有太多的故事可以说说。 不可思议的， 有趣的， 峰回路转的， 绝望的，幸福的...
祝那些赢得bidding war的buyer， 房市能可持续的增长。
没有买到的buyer, 也许福气在后面。
总之， 仁者见仁，智者见智， 过了暑假形势自然明朗。

entry.title: Alta Del Mar
entry.content: 看了preview, 人非常的多。 第一次从Carmel Mountain Rd过去的， 以前都是从Carmel Country上去的。 这次就感觉非常不好了， Power lines on the east side of the bridge...非常的显眼， 不是，是刺眼。 440的HOA， it's going to be gated community. $2200的Mello Roos. 4个Floorplan, 建成了3个， 一个我们最期待的平房， 2个是2 level的， 先说这个Alta Del Mar的设计师， 他去过中国很多的城市，北京上海杭州深圳， 去过8次， 设计过不少房子， 他自己也学了不少风水的理念。 不过哩，这个平房是前门大冲后门的。 你懂得。 而且family room根本没有办法摆沙发。 Plan3, 一开门就看到楼梯旋上去。 进门处就比较局促了。 plan 4, 不错， 没有明显的硬伤。 价格开的比原预期的贵。 第一期9个房子， 一个在大门口，一个在大门对面。 剩下的有view的lot就都快上2米了。 看图说话～

content.div: 一个家长写的

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;
background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

strong.style: color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

div.strong: My son graduated from MBMA, attended a top middle/high school

span.style: color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

div.span: and graduated with a 100% college acceptance rate. I was so impressed by his education at MBMA that I went on to become a montessori teacher. He received one of the finest educational foundations, and as his parents, we built upon it. Education is important to us. Mission Bay offers a well-rounded education at a favorable cost. The school offers advanced academics, mulitple foreign languages, band, and fine art classes. As an educator, I do not know of many programs in San Diego that have an award winning science program and a gold star level band program. After school programs range from robotics,youth karate, yoga, Chinese class, tennis lessons, and chess. Almost every child in school is enrolled in band. This school is doing a lot of things right! Perhaps it is not for every student; the academic program is challenging. It has educated many students who have gone on to attend some of the finest universities in the country. I know from personal experience that teachers address learning challenges early in the school year with goal setting conferences. It is an excellent school. Go on a tour and see.

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

span.style: color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;

strong.style: color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

div.strong: This is a wonderful school with rigorous academics and a

span.style: color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

div.span: rich curriculum. The teachers are very kind and loving but firm and expect a lot from the kids. The elementary school stays true to Montessori philosophy that learning is an individual endeavor rather than a group activity. Unit work is taught in a more traditional, group setting while reading and math are more one on one, especially in the lower grades. The student to teacher ratio is very good - often a 1:5 ratio due to how the childrens' day is structured. If you are considering this school, you have to see beyond the exterior; there is no beautiful landscaping or state of the art facilities. The beauty of the school is the educational program itself.

If you are considering this school, you have to see beyond the exterior; there is no beautiful landscaping or state of the art facilities. The beauty of the school is the educational program itself.

entry.title: 圣地亚哥（圣迭戈）的私立学校

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;
font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;
font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

div.span: 为什么上私校？加州的公立，上到好学区里面已经很好了。 私校真的有必要吗？

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;
font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

div.span: 一年3万块左右，首先

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

div.span: 很多人

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

div.span: 是不能负担的。 所以自然这个选择就排除了。

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;
font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

div.span: 我相信，如果不是高额的学费，会有很多人都会选择去私校。

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;
font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

div.span: 私校的设施好，环境优美这些硬件就不用说了。最重要的就是私校对于孩子的教育是比较量体裁衣。 老师对学生的比例是1：10左右。 老师的质量和水平高。 老师没有两把刷子，在私校要被家长布鲁下去的。 学生对老师的教学的反应有地方去说。 老师的态度是激励学生对学习和科学的兴趣。

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;
font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

div.span: 其次，私校的小scale, 对于孩子自信心和个性的培养肯定是有好处的。 私校走一圈下来接触到的学生都很阳光，也有教养，友好。 气质和公立的大部分学生截然不同。 学生人数少，课外辅导参加各种竞赛和课外小组的机会多。露脸的机会多慢慢就自信了。 另外，私校对于学生的文科，阅读和写作都相当的重视。

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;
font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

div.span: 最后，私校和一些好大学都有良好的connection, 对学生上大学都有4年计划，指导性强。私校花大钱雇佣专业人士帮助学生申请大学。 这些人都很有经验，帮学生确定方向和如何写申请。

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;
font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

div.span: 在私校家长的connection也更strong, 会定期有不少的活动

span.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium; line-height: 20.71875px;

div.span: 强。

span.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium; line-height: 20.71875px;

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 20.71875px;

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

div.span: 总之，私立还是公立， 大家总结的是 - 私校=保底不封顶 公校 = Sink or Swim

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 20.71875px;

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 20.71875px;

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

h1.div: 7. My Habit: Owned by Amazon.com, this flash sale site has great deals.

entry.title: SD home sales best in 7 years

div.style: border: 0px; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;
div.span: San Diego County housing prices rose
13.7 percent
over the last year to $358,000 as sales soared to their best November in seven years,

a.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #004b77; font-family: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-decoration: initial;

strong.style: border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-style: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;

div.span: reported Wednesday.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: It was the highest overall price since July 2008 as the market was skidding down and posted in March 2003 as prices were rocketing up.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: In brief, overall prices were 30.8 percent off the November 2005 peak but have risen 27.9 percent since the January 2009

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: Even Riverside up 3.6 percent from October and 10.5 percent from November 2011.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: "Investor activity and cash purchases remain unusually high,"

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: "All signals are pretty favorable for next year to continue the recent pace,"

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: As of Dec. 5, there were 4,636 homes for sale on the local multiple listing service. That was down 50.2 percent from December 2011's active listing total of 9,303. The current low inventory level is comparable to the go-go days of spring 2004.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: In La Jolla, Agents are cold-calling homeowners with offers from clients who have picked out a house they like because the inventory is so low.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: "I just don't know why all of sudden, The market hasn't gone up that much, but it's enough for some people to see a little bit of profit in the sale."

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: The overall Southern California trends mirrored San Diego's, with sales up 14.2 percent to 19,285 and median prices up 16.7 percent to $321,000 in the six-county region.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: Of particular interest is where prices were rising, regionally and locally.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

link.title: SD home sales best in 7 years

entry.title: Real estate: Find opportunity next year
entry.content:
Source: CNN Money
After five years of tumult, order and opportunity are finally being restored to the housing market.
"Housing is finally turning the corner," Stiff says. "There is no reason to be fearful of further large price declines."
This creates a new playing field for homeowners, who are finally able to sell, as well as would-be buyers who've been delaying a purchase in anticipation that prices would keep falling.
The Mortgage Bankers Association forecasts that more and more house hunters will start coming off the sidelines, with new-home loans for purchases expected to jump 55%, based in dollars, in 2013.
With that increased competition, "the days of buyers sticking it to sellers are over," says Salt Lake City real estate agent Tracie Peay.
Sellers: Don't get too excited just yet. You don't have a viselike grip on this market either. Indeed, for many, it still makes sense to wait to get better prices. This is especially true if you know that you won't be able to break even on your investment by unloading your house now, once you factor in the sales commission and other costs.
That said, don't assume that prices will be off to the races again in a year or two.
Fiserv forecasts that between now and 2017, homes will gain 3.3% a year in value. That's hardly red-hot. But at least the market isn't frozen anymore.

link.title: Real estate: Find opportunity next year

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: Water Damage 通常是主要的维修开支。令人头痛的是，当你发现有水渍的时候，通常破坏已经造成(it's too late)。在室内，只要有水的地方就有 Water Damage 的可能。下面一些小经验希望有参考作用。

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: 盥洗盆(Sink)

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: 厨房和洗手间的盥洗盆下面通常是木做的 Cabinet。如果滴水又没及时发现，日子长了，木就会霉烂掉。建议在 Cabinet 里铺上防水的 Liner Sheet。既防水又易清洁。定时检查 Cabinet 里头是否有水渍。

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: 热水器(Water Heater)

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: 热水器通常是安装在车库(Garage)或者阁楼(Attic)。如果安装在阁楼，一定要有滴水盘(Drip Pan)。热水器上了年纪就会漏水，这是免不了的。Drip Pan 的作用就是接住这些漏水，然后排出室外。建议定期检查 Drip Pan 看是否有水渍。也可以留意室外的排水管。我就是发现室外的排水管(PVC管)哗哗的流水，才知道热水器漏水了。

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: 空调(Air Conditioner)

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: 空调通常是安装在阁楼(Attic)。同样，空调有滴水盘(Drip Pan)。正常情况下，Drip Pan 应该是干燥的。如果 Drip Pan 有水，那就是空调的主排水管堵了。要马上修理。通常修理的办法是用压缩空气（像开香槟瓶），把水管中的残积物喷出。主排水管的出口通常是在洗手间的盥洗盆下的排水管。

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: 屋顶(Roof)

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: 屋顶的漏水通常比较难发现。因为通常是雨天漏，漏得也不多（否则天花板也可以看到水渍）。漏进来的水通常天晴后一、两天就挥发得无影无踪。建议在下大雨的时候到 Attic 去看看。如果有漏，要及时修补。

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: 浴室(Shower)

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: 要留意浴室的瓷砖是否有膨胀（鼓起）。膨胀通常是入水的迹象。通常是由于龙头开关或者排水管的密封圈老化造成的。

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: 屋檐导水槽(Gutter)

div.style: background-color: #e6e6dd; font-family: 宋体, SimSun, 细明体, MingLiU; font-size: 15px; line-height: 20.71875px;

content.div: Gutter 在室外，通常不会造成很大的 Water Damage。但如果 Gutter 被树叶等杂物堵塞，水就排不去了。积水增加了 Gutter 的重量，时间长了会对 Gutter 造成损坏。而且，水不能沿 Gutter 排下，就只能像瀑布一样“飞流直下”，造成屋檐下的泥土流失。建议定期清除 Gutter 的树叶、杂物。也可以考虑给 Gutter 加盖子。

entry.title: 4S 的 Townhouse communities
entry.content:
1. Ravanna & Amanti
近公园和小学，还有shopping center!
Ravanna是Townhouse, 连排的那种。 小区一共199家。 3种不同的户型。 都有2个车的车库。 价格现在大概是35万到50万不等。
Plan 1 - 1428
这个户型都是夹在中间的。 没有end unit.
一楼是厨房和客厅。 二楼是3个卧室。
小区里面这种户型的一共是72家（72家房客啊）
Plan 2 -
这个户型有意思啊。 是三层的。 进了小院门后先上楼，几个楼梯上去后，进门。 进门可以上楼，可以下楼。 上楼呢就是客厅厨房。 注意，客厅还是高厅，很漂亮的。 里面是一件卧室，有自己的卫生间。 然后下楼是一个卧室带自己的卫生间。 高厅的高处是一个loft, 小阁楼，可以作为书房。 个人认为不适合有小小孩的家庭。 不是很方便和安全。
Plan 3 - 1642
74户这样的户型。 全部都是end units. 这个好啊。 楼上还有一个小loft。 紧紧凑凑的。 光线也不错。
Amanti 是那种detached condo. 不和别家share wall.
2. Bridgeport - 一共是218套。 有6种不同的户型。 从959的一室一厅到1436的三室一厅都有。
过了马路就是Town center。

entry.title: Pines La Jolla
entry.content:
小区的名字是Pines La Jolla, 其实是UTC。 是个不常见的gated community呢。 而且UCSD的校车站在小区门口。 对面是UTC的一个还okay的小学，叫Doyle Elementary. 就是上图的那块绿地。
从外面看，真是很破啊。
地面还颇有特色
好像走进了某个西班牙的旧宅子。 破旧的有情调。 墙上的tile...
每个房间的门，两边的木雕花都是不同的。 很像南美的motel吧。
电梯包着地毯
厨房...
壁炉上奇怪图案的瓷砖
看的出来吗，是高厅，挑高的还有天窗。光线很好，出去就是天台。 不是阳台哦。 是一大片的顶楼上的天台。
客厅的另外一角
窗口看出去。
卧室1号
卧室2号

div.style: clear: both; text-align: left;

a.style: margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: In a rare move, the 4S Ranch Master Association filed suit against 4S Kelwood General Partnership, the developer of the commuinity west of Rancho Bernardo in unincorporated San Diego County. An executive for Kelwood said the suit focuses on trees and common area walls, but Realtors said its mere existence made lenders leery of giving mortgages, creating headaches for buyers.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: Construction lawsuits are common in San Diego, but complaints from the master plan association are unusual because they cover so many more houses and condos.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: Unlike for houses, lending documents on a condominium include a check box which indicates whether a construction defect lawsuit has been filed on the property. For many lenders, just seeing that box checked will cause them to deny a loan.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: Some lenders will still give a loan, but they'll often require a much larger down payment, making it harder for a typical condo buyer to close the deal. When the pool of buyers for a property diminishes like that, prices can drop.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: "The lawsuit does not cover anything in the units in itself, it has to deal with common area improvements ---- walls and landscape." some of the street-side walls had cracked, and some of the trees had not done well in the 10 years since they'd been planted.

div.style: background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 0px;

content.div: "It will create challenges for many people trying to create financing,"

entry.title: Home Prices Climb as Supply Dwindles

div.style: background-color: white; clear: right; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 1.4em; line-height: 1.5em; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 8px; margin-right: 8px; padding: 0px;

content.div: Home prices rose by their largest percentage in at least seven years during the second quarter, propelled by low inventories of properties for sale and high demand for bargain-priced foreclosures, according to two reports Tuesday.

div.style: background-color: white; clear: right; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 1.4em; line-height: 1.5em; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 8px; margin-right: 8px; padding: 0px;

content.div: Prices rose by 2.5% in June from a year ago, and by 6% from the previous quarter, said CoreLogic Inc., a Santa Ana, Calif., data firm. The quarterly jump was the largest since 2005.

div.style: background-color: white; clear: right; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 1.4em; line-height: 1.5em; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 8px; margin-right: 8px; padding: 0px;

content.div: Separately, Freddie Mac, which uses a different methodology, said home prices during the second quarter jumped by 4.8% from the previous quarter. That was the largest jump since 2004.

link.title: Home Prices Climb as Supply Dwindles

entry.title: 何其幸运 - 上半年的总结
entry.content:
有那么多的好客户，有那么多的好朋友，我何其幸运。 希望也能把我的幸运带给他们！
2012年的上半年，我已经帮助18位客户买到了中意的房子，有一个是一个，各个儿拉出来都是好房子。 有很顺利的，也有九九81难的。 我为我自己的成绩骄傲，也为我的客户们高兴。
昨天和Pardee的sales聊天，确认了我是2011年Pardee新房卖出最多的agent, 名声在外，不能砸了牌子。
偷闲儿还要帮我的一些单身朋友介绍对象。这个是我的爱好。 今年so far介绍成一对儿，但愿他们有好结果。另外就是我过去的客户今年内有10几家生孩子的。 所以我也没少逛carters和gymboree。 有一对双胞胎boys, 还有一对龙凤胎哦。
我的博客每天的page view保持在30-70. 最近太忙了也没有catch up， 为了对得起读者，还要勤奋一些。 给我的Realtor生活也留个记录。

link.title: 何其幸运 - 上半年的总结

entry.title: New principle for Monterey Ridge in 4S Ranch
entry.content: Michael Olander Monterey Ridge Elementary School Principal Mr. Olander has been an elementary school principal for four years at West Orange Elementary School in the Orange Unified School District. Previous to that, he served as assistant principal at Temecula Elementary School in the Temecula Valley Unified School District (2006-2008). He began his career in education at Anza Elementary School in the Cajon Valley Union School District as an elementary school counselor in 1998, and then as a Special Education teacher for an upper grade Special Day Class. Mr. Olander’s educational background includes a Bachelor of Arts degree in Psychology with a minor in Biology and a Master of Arts degree in Counseling Psychology from San Diego State University. Mr. Olander’s school administration credential is from Chapman University.

entry.title: What is developing between Del Sur and 4S Ranch

div.style: clear: both; text-align: center;

content.div: 女儿踢球的小朋友的爸爸正好是92127杂志的主编。 很早之前就听他说要建一个新的小学在现在的高中旁边。

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 6px; margin-right: 6px; text-align: justify;

content.div:
上个月Oak valley中学的校长正式调离，将要出任新的学校校长。 这样，未来4S Ranch/ Del Sur会建一个新的学校，从K - 8年纪。 就在Del Norte High的旁边。下图橘红色的就是这个新学校的位置。 旁边蓝色的回事一个town center, business park. 紫色地带会是新的房子。
整个development计划是2018年完成。

clear: both; text-align: center;

a.style: margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 6px; margin-right: 6px; text-align: justify;

link.title: What is developing between Del Sur and 4S Ranch

div.style: clear: both; text-align: center;

a.style: margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 6px; margin-right: 6px; text-align: justify;
div.span: 4,677 acres of land located south of Santa Fe Valley and adjoining the communities of Fairbanks Ranch and Rancho Peñasquitos. Southern portions of the property are characterized by gently rolling hills, which ascend from the edge of Rancho Santa Fe and Fairbanks Ranch to the base of Black Mountain, a local landmark. This distinctive setting presents views of Del Mar and the Pacific Ocean. Northern portions of the property consist of a relatively flat mesa, promontories of which overlook a broad central plain known as La Jolla Valley.

div.style: background-color: white; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 6px; margin-right: 6px; text-align: justify;

content.div: Approximately one-quarter of Black Mountain Ranch lies within the planning area of the proposed San Dieguito River Park. When assembled, the San Dieguito River Park will extend from Del Mar on the coast to Volcan Mountain more than fifty miles inland. Black Mountain Ranch will provide a critical link between the proposed San Dieguito River Park and the City’s existing Black Mountain Regional Park, providing public access in the area for the first time. In addition, this linkage will preserve approximately 1,760 acres of existing and enhanced habitat, including protection of key wildlife corridors as part of the City’s Environmental Tier and Multiple Species Conservation Program (MSCP).

entry.title: 买房也要顺其自然
entry.content: 为求一份尽善尽美，人们绞尽脑汁，殚精竭虑。而每遇关系重大、情形复杂的状况，更是为之寝食难安。 其实，就如我们遇上难越的坎儿，与其百般思量，不如顺其自然，反倒能够柳暗花明又一村。 没有十全十美，但是让我们尽力，也随缘。

entry.title: Highland Village 详解
entry.content:
开往Highland village的路上。 这一条是Carmel Country Road. 路上顺手拍的。 路边都是120-180左右的房子。 今天是个阴天，而且现在都5点多了。所以照片出来都暗。
快到了。
入口处。 今天是阴天。 所以看上去不咋地的。
如果接着开，下一个路口的红绿灯，是一个丁字路口，右转就是Carmel Mountain Road了。 也就是那些临街的所在。见下图远处的红绿灯的地方就是。
包括highland village小区，整个的大区（算上豪宅们）就统称为：
车子右转了之后，上了Carmel Mountain Road, 在右手就可以看到的就是这些临街的房子了。
我一边看车一边拍的。 虚的。 不过可以看出来房子距离街道不远的。
Highland village的东南方，都是豪宅区了。 绿化的不错。
旁边区的房子。 距离1分钟车程都是这样的房子了。 这个是我们这里最highly sought after的区。
从路口开过去： 有一些正在建的。 是最后一批了。 已经全部卖了。绿色的这一片，就是未来要盖shopping & 洗衣店还有小型restaurants.
进小区的路。
Sales Office
样板房远看
Clubhouse, 里面有乒乓球，台球，健身房，游泳池（size很大的）厨房，BBQ，还有多功能厅，还有客房（可以出租，比旅馆便宜）等等。
Plan 2 157, 从外面看去。
进门右手是客厅，对面有一个可以放电视柜的凹进去的地方，然后开门正面是厨房，厨房的右手是吃饭的Nook
地面
沙发对面的一个进去的地方正好摆放一个电视桌，不占地方
厨房特写
厨房对面的nook：
一楼的厕所：是绿色的竹子做的纤维的壁纸的。
一楼的closet, 超级大，在楼梯下面还有更多的储藏空间。可以放置很多东西。
上楼的楼梯。
一上到二楼是一个loft, 很大，很宽敞，有窗，可以用作书房。
楼上的第二个bathroom
第二个bedroom
从这个卧室的窗子看出去就看到了clubhouse, 有个人在烤肉。
主卧室
游泳池和clubhouse
小区内大部分都已经入住了

entry.title: Recovery or Not
entry.content: 每年的年初，大牛都要Forecast了。 我这人虽然算不上大牛，但是不能免俗，也经常小预测一把。 而且以前也时不时的帮客户抄到底，买到过超值的房子。 让人就不免的骄傲。今年呢，我个人觉得应该还是会flat。 但是从本月来，房市慢慢复苏，然后某本地大公司从去年年底开始到现在都在狂招人，大家都开始坐不住了。 不过买房子考虑因素很多，好房子总是很少，而且每年都是暑假开始前热那么一段时间。 所以不着急的还是稳住。

content.div: UC San Diego grads are bringing home the bacon. In the PayScale College Salary Report, UCSD ranked 8th in salary potential for bachelor's degree graduates of state schools.

div.style: background-color: white; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; border-left-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-top-width: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; margin-bottom: 0.714em; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-top: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: PayScale, a web site that charts salary trends and data, reviewed more than 1,000 colleges and universities. Salary data for advanced degree graduates was not included in the survey.

div.style: background-color: white; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; border-left-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-top-width: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; margin-bottom: 0.714em; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-top: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: The typical starting salary for UC San Diego graduates with two years of experience is $48,200; mid-career professionals with a UC San Diego bachelor’s degree and 15 years of experience typically make $96,700 annually, according to PayScale.

div.style: clear: both; text-align: center;

a.style: margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;

div.style: background-color: white; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; border-left-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-top-width: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; margin-bottom: 0.714em; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-top: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;

content.div: UC San Diego noted that nearly 40 percent of the university’s undergraduate students directly pursue graduate and/or professional degrees after graduating. In addition, it reported that 40 percent of the university’s alumni (about 56,550) live in San Diego County, contributing income, payroll, property and sales taxes to the region.

div.style: background-color: white; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; border-left-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-top-width: 0px; margin-bottom: 0.714em; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-top: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;

span.style: color: black; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: 1px; line-height: 20px; text-align: left;

div.span: 從聖地牙哥加州大學（UCSD）畢業的學生掙錢前景優於其他許多學校。專門蒐集並分析研究工薪資訊的網站「PayScale」已將該校畢業生「掙工資潛力」（Salary Potential）列為全國第八。

div.style: color: black; font-family: verdana, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; letter-spacing: 1px; line-height: 18px; text-align: left;

content.div: 網站調查，UCSD本科畢業生凡有兩年工作經驗者，普遍能有4萬8200元的年薪；有15年經驗者年收入則為9萬6700元。

div.style: color: black; font-family: verdana, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; letter-spacing: 1px; line-height: 18px; text-align: left;

content.div: 在2011年，UCSD頒授8161份畢業文憑。該校歷年的畢業校友（約有14萬1000人）有40%仍住在聖地牙哥。他們與該校教職員工在當地創辦646家公司，包括不少成功的生物技術企業，為發展地方經濟、提供就業機會作出很大貢獻。

div.style: color: black; font-family: verdana, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; letter-spacing: 1px; line-height: 18px; text-align: left;

content.div: UCSD的校友事務主任阿爾明‧阿弗薩希（Armin Afsahi）樂見「PayScale」網站的這一評鑑，他表示，學校的學術成就相當突出，不但始終居於領先地位，而且對學生未來的生涯規畫有很大助益。

div.style: text-align: left;
clear: both; text-align: center;

a.style: margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;

div.style: clear: both; text-align: left;

content.div: The Hyatt hotel heir Anthony Pritzker just completed a 49,300-square-foot home in LA. The 49,300-square-foot, two-story home surrounds a courtyard and includes a two-level basement with amenities including a game room, bowling alley, bar and media library. Above ground, there's a gym with changing rooms, his-and-hers offices, an arts-and-crafts room and a hairdressing area. Other buildings on the property, including a detached recreation room and a guest house, bring the total square footage of the compound to just over 53,000 square feet.

entry.title: San Diego房租上涨，despite 房价下跌。
entry.content:
最近看了一下，发现圣地亚哥的租房市场需求强劲，最近好几个4S的3000尺single family homes 都轻松租出去了，一般在$3300/month 左右。Townhouse 也很好租，加上现在的低利率，买房出租是一个不错的选择。当然好几个邻居都是因为relocation/回国，但是能租出cover mortgage and tax, 省去了他们的后顾之忧。
以Carmel Valley 一个小区为例，在2006年时，我们在那里租房，1900尺townhouse, 月租$2200, 售价为$720k左右；5年后的现在，在Zillow上看了一下，月租$2800, 售价$620k.
WOW, 房租涨了25%， 尽管房价掉了15%！
而同时30年房贷利息由6% 降到现在的4.25%甚至是3.875。

link.title: San Diego房租上涨，despite 房价下跌。

entry.title: The Economist: Rising From the Ruin, on Housing Recovery in US
entry.content:
There is an article about US housing pointing to possible recovery. I'm never really into this kind of prediction but it never hurts to listen to someone's opinion especially from a well respected journal as "The Economist".
A few excerpts from the article:
The potential for a strong housing recovery lies in the depths of the bust. Fewer homes will be added to the housing stock this year than in any year since records began in 1968. In September the inventory of newly built houses for sale fell to its lowest level since record-keeping began.
Rental markets, by contrast, look far stronger. Nationally, rents rose 2.1% in the year to August, in stark contrast to house prices;Rising rents help housing markets heal on both the supply and demand side, by encouraging renters to consider buying and through the movement of supply into the rental market, easing the glut of houses for sale.
However, The macroeconomic environment remains troublesome. Foreclosures are falling, but they continue to place downward pressure on prices.
A new analysis by Goldman Sachs argues that housing can “punch above its weight” in recoveries. Rising house values boost confidence and spending. A housing recovery should also give monetary policy more traction; low interest rates do less to perk up the economy when housing markets are depressed. Indeed, the Federal Reserve is considering nudging recovery along by buying mortgage assets, which should ease the flow of credit to borrowers.

link.title: The Economist: Rising From the Ruin, on Housing Recovery in US

entry.title: 三宅一生
entry.content:
有一款香水，“三宅一生”，清冽恬淡，沁人心脾。
朋友调侃道说，三宅一生，女人一辈子就是在三所房子里度过：小时候，在父母的房子里；长大后，在丈夫的房子；老去后，在儿女的房子里，静静看日出日落，怀想倏忽的这一生。
女人一辈子就是三间房。多少女子的青春在三宅里蹉跎，红颜苍老，多少故事上演？女人这辈子，大概是注定要和房子纠缠不清的。
不过呢，现在的人可是不甘心困于“三宅一生”了，房子是越多越好。
这世上很多东西是不能过头的，即使是爱情和金钱，但一般人总是希望这两样东西越多越好。有的人对于房子，更是胃口难填。
